channel.title: Banning code for 508 servers only
channel.description: Hi can someone tell me the code for ban so i can ban players and unban i only want admins to ban people and to deban so i want ::ban and ::deban please someone tell me the code oo and tell me which files to put it in and where in the files

item.title: Banning code for 508 servers only
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("ban"))
{
    int pid = -1;
    if((pid = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(4))) != -1)
    {
        client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[pid];
        c.sendMessage("ASSHAT");
        c.showInterface(99999);
        appendToBanned(c.playerName);
    }
    else
    {
        sendMessage(command.substring(4)+" is not online.");
    }
}

Read full topic
